### Build fallback device configuration

#### Description

Build fallback device configuration

#### Usage

```r
.build_fallback_devices(model, strategy)
```

#### Arguments

- **`model`**: Character. Model type.
- **`strategy`**: Character. Memory strategy.

#### Value

Named list of device assignments.
